column11: Support vector machine-based intrusion detection methods are increasingly being researched because it can detect novel attacks. Feature selection or attribution reduction can help reduce the SVM classification time and saving memory space effectively. This paper concerns using rough set for attribution ranking and reducing and using support vector machine for intrusion detection classification.
